artist: Artist: Vicki; Artist: Christuffer; Publisher: Vicki , San Francisco
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Loose, folded leaves, xerographic photo-collage of text, abstracted designs, and two photographic images of a female figure printed on wove paper covers; 44 pp.
title: the c.p.a.b., no. 4 (recto)
